jump_scares.spoiler: There is a slight jump scare as we get a sudden flashback to Arlette’s decomposing corpse in the well
A rat scuttles out from underneath a box
A man opens a closet door and a body falls out
A man opens the door revealing Eddie in his non-human state
The cop searching for the beast is suddenly grabbed
There is a sudden growl
The creature growls and comes forward quickly
The cop is impaled from behind
The creature breaks through the window
A dog starts barking at the fence as Clare and Andi walk by
As the man reaches into the water to touch the parasite, it jumps onto him
A parasite walks onto the security camera and shrieks
A sheep carcass comes down from the ceiling
The hanging sheep moves
A sheep hybrid comes out of the darkness
The woman suddenly screams while driving, followed by a cut to a deformed looking man on the car window
A vulture suddenly screeches and flies into the car through a side window
There is a wide shot of some ruins while Paul is driving down a road. Suddenly, a burnt hand appears on one of the bricks accompanied by a string sound effect
Paul reaches in for the water, and Djinn’s hand suddenly reaches out of it and grabs him
A girl appears to commit suicide on camera by shooting herself in the head (although not a jump scare as we get some warning, viewers might find the scene traumatic)
The cardboard boxes fall over
Alice becomes increasingly nervous as she walks alone through central park at night. A low growl causes Alice to look around and immediately after a bus pulls up in front of her. [Video]
Alice hears low growling and sees glimpses of a shadow as she swims in the pool, this builds to a sudden louder yowl which causes Alice to scream
While climbing down a cube hatch, Cassandra is suddenly grabbed on the leg
Upon crawling through a passage a woman is suddenly dragged upwards
A corpse suddenly springs back up and makes a gasping noise
The oil slick jumps onto Rachel hand and eats her alive
Mrs. Lansing hits a hitchhiker with her Mercedes
The dead hitchhiker, jump into Mrs. Lansing’s window
A scary face flashes up on Casey’s laptop. [Video]
The kid’s toy begins to yell in an adult voice
As Elizabeth leans forward, the railing suddenly breaks and she falls forwards
A wooden plank snaps beneath Elizabeth’s feet and she screams and falls down
A body falls and hits a truck
An elevator drops down close to the building’s repairman
Someone falls onto the top of the elevator causing a loud bang
The devil appears from behind the people who are still alive
Clint looks down from the sky and sees the monster standing right behind Adam
Clint looks up to see Adam trapped in a cage of antlers
Something large suddenly falls down in front of the window and bangs on it
Will’s foot slips on the snow and he falls down
There is an explosion
Lucy’s daughter appears in a dream and doesn’t appear to be human
Adrian startles Lucy while she snoops around his office
A dog bark startles Jenny as she sunbathes
As a joke Steve scares Jenny in the tent
A car horn blares during a suspenseful scene
Kimberly has a vision of some pigeons
Kat’s air-bag is set off, causing her head to be impaled on the tube behind her
The barbecue blows up in the distance
An owl lands on the window sill of Alex’s bedroom
Todd’s dead body twitches
Terry is hit by a bus. [Video]
The teacher’s computer explodes as she leans over it
Just as in the original Austrian version, the title card appears on screen alongside loud heavy metal music which will likely startle those with the sound turned up
A woman screams
A neighbor says “hey kid!” as he’s trying to get into the cellar
The door slams shut
The small grabber jumps up after Lisa asks “is it dead?” and then attacks the group
Bea screams as Paul touches her
The computer makes a noise and turns off suddenly while Paul is using it
The alien creature twitches on the bed
Some lights come on and an animal in a trap is seen
The old woman suddenly attacks from behind
A hammer suddenly strikes out of the hole in the wall
The camera pans back and reveals Danny standing in the doorway

movies.title: I Am Not a Serial Killer

jump_scares.spoiler: A woman is suddenly hit by a car while crossing the road
Mrs. Crowley calls out in her sleep
Accompanied by a sound effect, Mr. Crowley bursts into the house
Sarah imagines her husband is still with her until she has a flashback of the car incident
Sarah is startled by a loud noise which triggers her to spot a silhouette in the window
The man is stabbed from behind by the strange woman
The officer screams at Sarah
As the young woman and Jake begin to kiss, there is suddenly a cut to an old man watching them with loud echoing noises
A cult member runs at Jay
Ani suddenly shoots Kate
A still shot of the ocean is suddenly interrupted by the shark jumping out of it
As Michael swims through the water, there is a cut to a moray eel swimming at his face/the camera
There is a cut to the shark quickly rising out of the water
Venna is grabbed from behind inside the corn field
While Fuller is looking through the back window, the truck driver breaks the window from the inside

movies.title: Jason Goes to Hell: The Final Friday

jump_scares.spoiler: The woman at the cabin is startled when Jason appears right behind her
Diana is spooked when a police officer surprises when she goes outside to get ice
One of the cop characters is attacked by the possessed reporter
Freddy Krueger’s gloved hand bursts out of the ground and snatches Jason’s mask
The face from Alice’s phone footage suddenly comes towards the camera. [Video]
A burning moose jumped in the shot
The whisperer’s mouth abruptly opens, releasing blinding lights onto John
The young woman suddenly growls and bites down at the samurai’s neck
Fred opens the car trunk and the man inside jumps out and grabs him
A door slams shut
There is a sudden bang on the door
There is a loud gunshot during a quiet scene
Skip opens the car door, breaking Amy out of her daze
As Morgan walks towards Amy, Lee suddenly appears in view behind Morgan
After entering the toilet, we see a figure in the mirror watching Dani. A few seconds later Dani runs out of the toilet and this is accompanied by some loud dissonant strings in the soundtrack

Josh is distracted by a person (who he believes to be Mark) entering the temple behind him. After he turns around and tells him “we’re not supposed to be here”, he is hit over the head by an unseen assailant
After witnessing Simon’s body being displayed ritualistically, Christian sits back up and a man blows some powder into Christian’s eyes
Paul wakes up and Annie is standing directly over his bed
Annie shoots Buster through the back with a shotgun
Annie jumps on Paul as he crawls away
Reggie’s coworker opens the door, followed by a cut to a zombified man attacking him
Reggie turns around to leave and the zombified man suddenly jumps up from behind some boxes
A drone appears in front of Ian as he climbs the crane
A sudden sound of smashing dishes
As Maddox is in the water, a floating dead body bumps into her
A zombie appears in the doorway behind Jeong
As Jeong raises his rifle to look through the scope, a group of zombies suddenly appears in the night vision
The zombie in the driver’s seat suddenly opens his eyes, accompanied by a loud noise
A car slams into the side of the truck
A man with a knife suddenly lunges at Nick
A snowball hits the window
A blast of air comes from the fireplace
The hand of the corpse moves
A loud noise plays
The kids turn and see a body

While spoiling as little as possible, during a scene in which Amanda is in bed and Maud is next to her, Amanda says something that upsets Maud, causing her to begin crying. A few seconds later, Amanda suddenly springs upwards and her face looks distorted

Hard to describe without spoiling as it is literally the final shot of the movie, but can roughly be described as a scene in which Maud is lifting her arms and people are bowing down, there is a sudden cut to her screaming
A strange girl tapping on a window may startle some viewers
A man in a sleeping bag yells out as Mike shines his torch on him
The mailman is stabbed with a needle
The camera cuts back from the casket to Petrie standing behind Billy, who startles him
While jogging, Tatyana suddenly runs into an inmate
Tatyana places her hand on the window, and the alien suddenly lunges at the glass
While reaching out to the alien, Tatyana suddenly slips on the goo on the floor and falls
Hippy spies on the SEALs attaching the warhead to one of the remote operated vehicles. He tries to go back to warn the others but Coffey is standing right behind him
Lindsey attempts to radio for help and gets as far as “Deep Core this is Cab One we need assist…..” before sparks come out of the electronics and the power goes out
There is a quick, loud cut to a fire
As seen through a bathroom mirror, Cortese suddenly pulls open the shower curtains and attacks Bartone
The mummy’s gauze suddenly flies at the windshield of a car
The body of Cortese suddenly twitches
A cutout of Ich comes out of the top of the calendar
There is a sudden musical sting
The window breaks and Ich reaches inside
Louis, who appears to be dead, suddenly coughs which startles the mortuary assistant
A book slams down in front of the hamster
A loud sound effect may startle some viewers
A strange looking humanoid creature covered in barnacles suddenly looks up at Dr. Pascal
One of the ghost kids suddenly appears (loud noise, during a pan to the right
One of the ghost kids is floating in the air (cut, loud noise
When the kid is cycling, suddenly the ghost kids appear (cut, loud noise
A dog barks, startling Ted
During a dream, the witches burst into Sarah’s room and attack her
The bathroom stall slams open to reveal the witches standing outside
Nancy quickly opens a shower door, startling Sarah
Nancy suddenly and aggressively attacks Sarah
Aaron turns around after entering the cabin and sees several of the group members
There is an explosion from the wreckage of the aircraft
A spear pierces through Kara’s neck
One of the tribesmen grabs Justine around the leg
Justine has a dream where she bites Alejandro on the neck after he returns from the jungle
Lindsay opens he curtain to reveal Heiter standing there with a gun
During a tense scene Lindsay accidentally kicks a metallic object lying on the ground
Katsuro suddenly stabs Heiter in the foot
Kranz hears a loud gunshot coming from somewhere in the house
The wind blows the window shut
Miss Giddens sees a face appear at the window
A thunder clap wakes Miss Giddens
There is a scream and the camera suddenly zooms in on a statue
Accompanied by a loud orchestral chord, Winslow turns around to see Wake towering over him
Water breaks through the window accompanied by a discordant orchestral note
Winslow suddenly punches the clock
Wake suddenly runs at Winslow with an axe (this is accompanied by a loud orchestral beat)
The scene abruptly cuts from Jim typing to a very loud gunshot
Brent is grabbed by Lola from behind while looking down the hole
Lola’s scrapbook flies at the windshield while Holly is driving
While the camera slowly zooms in on Lola there is a cut to the car right in front of her when they collide
A fully possessed Mink jumps at the camera and screams
Mink is standing in the filed before attacking the crew
Mink pulls out a knife and attacks
A possessed person jumps out in front of the cameraman
The Fouke Monster unexpectedly opens a window and reaches its hand inside at the family
The Fouke Monster hits the bathroom window
As Bobby walks back towards the house, he suddenly runs into the Fouke Monster
Maya closes a cupboard revealing Jurgis behind her in the mirror
Someone jumps out at Sam as a joke
Sam looks around the room and runs into a woman wearing a mask
Sun-ju opens the closet door and there is a quick flash of an image of Sang-Mi’s corpse
Sun-ju looks up from the well and there is a loud flashback to the scene of the old woman from the tape
The TV suddenly turns on
There are several quick cuts to the twins lying in the hallway covered in blood
Jack jumps out and attacks Hallorann with an axe
The camera quickly pans to show a bloodied man standing in the hallway behind Wendy
Mike suddenly grabs Lisa from behind
A man in hazmat suit suddenly enters the room
A distorted face suddenly flashes on-screen
A demon hand grabs her and startles her awake
A quick cut to the Djinn in full makeup
The Djinn appears at the shower curtain
There is a sudden musical burst as Charlie sees someone in the car
The coffin lid blows open
Betty sees Charlie in the car mirror
A police officer is shot through the back of a car while driving. Although telegraphed, the impact is rather sudden
While a man is driving, there is a sudden cut to Katarina on the road accompanied by a sound cue
A seemingly dead woman suddenly springs back up from behind Paul and screeches
Some fireworks are let off, interrupting a conversation in a nearby car
A man is suddenly shot in a car
A sudden cut to a man firing a gun at a shooting range may startle some viewers
